frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Department of Classical Studies Records, 1840-2007 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center UA 158
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: The collection includes subject files from 1963-1976 related to language placement, summer sessions, and a self-study of the Department of Classical Studies at the College of William and Mary. It also contains publications such as fliers and brochures from the Summer Institute in Latin and the Humanities. The collection also includes questions from William and Mary classes dated to 1840-1841.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: College of William and Mary, Dept. of Classical Studies Records, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: A portion of this collection was previously part of the University Archives Publications Collection. The following items were transferred from the College Papers Collection:-A 1938 letter from the Ancient and Modern Languages department to a prospective student.-The 1937 Latin Tournament questions of the Virginia Classical Association held at the College of William and Mary on April 17, 1937.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Box and folder list compiled by Vicki O'Brien, SCRC Staff, in April 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Dept. of Classical Studies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes subject files from 1963-1976 related to language placement, summer sessions, and a self-study of the Department of Classical Studies at the College of William and Mary. It also contains publications such as fliers and brochures from the Summer Institute in Latin and the Humanities. The collection also includes questions from William and Mary classes dated to 1840-1841.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Department of Modern Languages (UA 211), Office of the Dean of Arts and Sciences (UA 310) , and various other administrative records.
Information about related materials is available at http://guides.swem.wm.edu/wm

controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
